I'm not sure what else might change about the MacBook when you plug in the external monitor. At this point I'm wondering if there's some software setting that is turning the graphics card to full power when you plug in your external monitor, but I'm a Windows and Linux guy, not a Mac guy, sorry. My answers so far have applied to all computers in general but OSX problems are out of my scope...
